name: rail-way
description: Hello! Welcome to our GitHub. The application we're developing is to solve the issue of displaying a rail schedule for Nigeria which has recently been developing its rail network. At this time it is only possible to aquire a paper schedule for the country's rail system.

scripts.install: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test-client && npm run test-server
